name: Haven_Discovery
description:
Haven_Discovery Alpha1.1b Released:

Changelog:

  • Actions now have consequences.
  • Made background have clickable area's. So do characters.
  • Opinion counter now can effect how the character speaks to you.
  • Opinion checks added, high opinion unlocks more speech options.
  • Asset links are now in separate file.  Lets me be more creative.
  • More voice Audio
  • Added animated snow, though currently disabled. 
  • Added 'Game over' scenario, Eebee can now desert you if option falls too low.

Alpha1.1b changelog: 

  • Cleaned up graphics, Haven now looks prettier.
  • Added more voice audio, Eebee will now talk more.
  • Added new music that fits the scenes.
  • Added Boop counter
  • Added Crypto counter
  • Added Opinion counter
  • Counters now can effect the story line. 
  • Added a very simple datacontroler, now Eebee wont forget the things you said/done to her. 
  • Conversation selections will now disappear when clicked. 
  • Linked VN to CAIMEO.
